question: Lucas collects garbage from 7 different apartment complexes. The first six have 350 apartments each and the last one is 45% bigger than the other six combined. He collects garbage 3 times a week from each place and he gets paid £0.2 per collection for each apartment. How much money does he make in a week?
answer:
The first six complexes have 6*350=<<6*350=2100>>2100 apartments
Number 7 has 2100*0.45=<<2100*0.45=945>>945 more apartments than those six combined.
So in total, it has 2100+945=<<2100+945=3045>>3045 apartments.
So in total, he goes to 3045+2100=<<3045+2100=5145>>5145 apartments each time
That means he visits 5145*3=<<5145*3=15,435>>15,435 apartments every week
So he makes 15,435*£0.2=£<<15,435*0.2=3087>>3087 every week
#### 3087
